messages.content: Britain today is less fair than ever. People who work hard and play by the rules should be able to get on in life, but our failing politics means that more and more people can’t. The Liberal Democrats will build an economy that works for everyone.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: A Lib Dem government led by Jo Swinson will stop Brexit on day one and get on with the job of improving everyone’s lives.

Climate change and air pollution threaten our future. Working with the EU enables us to work together to protect our planet. The Liberal Democrats will put Britain on a path to becoming carbon neutral at the earliest possible date.

mentions.candidate: Christina's plan for Nottingham North: 1. Improve our local health & social care services 2. Fund our local schools so children can flourish 3. Stop Brexit to protect jobs, end inequalities & build a brighter future.
mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: Who knows where Jeremy Corbyn stands on Brexit: Labour say they want to negotiate their own Brexit deal.
mentions.partyLeader: A Lib Dem government led by Jo Swinson will stop Brexit on day one and get on with the job of improving everyone’s lives.
mentions.tacticalSituation: European Election results here in the East Midlands show the Lib Dems CAN win and are the Remain party that can win in Nottingham.

issues.brexitEurope: Stop Brexit to protect jobs, end inequalities & build a brighter future.
issues.economy: The Liberal Democrats will build an economy that works for everyone.
issues.education: Fund our local schools so children can flourish.
issues.environment: Climate change and air pollution threaten our future. Working with the EU enables us to work together to protect our planet.
issues.health: Improve our local health & social care services

leaflet.personalStatement: Christina joined the British Army in 2001 and trained as a Royal Engineer before being appealed to the Liberal Democrats by their fight for justice and fair representation. She is passionate about preventing the climate crisis and making the country more fair, giving everyone the chance to succeed. Christina wants an economy built on honest principles: where wealth and power are more evenly shared and where everyone benefits from our public services and economy.

politicalExperience.role: Christina joined the Liberal Democrats in 2017 and became Vice Chair in the Nottingham Liberal Democrats. She is a full-time carer for her son and can often be seen working around Nottingham giving support room to families experiencing similar issues.

examples: European Election results here in the East Midlands show the Lib Dems CAN win and are the Remain party that can win in Nottingham.

Britain today is less fair than ever. People who work hard and play by the rules should be able to get on in life, but our failing politics means that more and more people can’t. The Liberal Democrats will build an economy that works for everyone.
Improve our local health & social care services
Fund our local schools so children can flourish
European Election results here in the East Midlands show the Lib Dems CAN win and are the Remain party that can win in Nottingham.
A Lib Dem government led by Jo Swinson will stop Brexit on day one
Climate change and air pollution threaten our future
The Liberal Democrats will put Britain on a path to becoming carbon neutral at the earliest possible date.

personalStories.story: Christina joined the British Army in 2001 and trained as a Royal Engineer before being appealed to the Liberal Democrats by their fight for justice and fair representation. She is passionate about preventing the climate crisis and making the country more fair, giving everyone the chance to succeed.

examples: The Conservatives want to merge through a damaging Brexit that will cost jobs and risk the end of the United Kingdom.
Who knows where Jeremy Corbyn stands on Brexit: Labour say they want to negotiate their own Brexit deal.
Who knows where Jeremy Corbyn stands on Brexit: Labour say they want to negotiate their own Brexit deal.
